divs: Sighting DetailsCould not sleep, went out side on my patio to observe stars and constellations. Was watching the area around Orion, when I saw what I thought was a star, suddenly get bright gold in color. This "star" then did something which defied gravity, logic and reality...it started to slowly move north northeast, then sped up, made a nearly 90 degree angle turn, then slowly got dim and i lost sight of it.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sharkey
There were no other sightings in Sharkey on or around July 28th 2011
Summary: Previously dim gold orb, gets bright, moves, makes 90 degree turn then goes dim...
